[vc_row content_placement=”top”][vc_column css_animation=”bounceInRight” width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-arrow-left” color=”black” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fslasscom.lk%2Fcareer%2F|title:Careers||”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”JOIN THE SLASSCOM FAMILY” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Give wings to your potential here at SLASSCOM. Here, you also get to create a meaningful impact for the country. Explore the many exciting career opportunities and step into the world of an exciting and a rewarding career.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
